title: Thank you
content: Hello. This is a thank you note for the excellent support I received on a gmail issue. My thank you goes out to: 'jscher2000@support.mozilla.org', he is very professional and an asset to the Mozilla team. Thank you very much. Rich Everett
creator: rtebge

title: i have no sound and nothing works
content: i cant play sound from firefox ive tried restarting my computer, disabling my adblocker, everything i can think of its not my headphones, they work fine with files on my computer im having the same problem with davinci resolve too please someone help i dont know what to do anymore
creator: princesshopeless13

title: External open specific url will open on container
content:
I've exactly the same problem as described here. https://support.mozilla.org/de/questions/1442833

> For some reason, in my firefox profile, when I try to access > "https://accounts.google.com", it open on new tab with a specific > container, while other url keep open with no container. I've never > configure this behavior, or found a setting to fix it.

This is a privacy problem, because most of the time when I open a website like google.com, I don't want to be logged in so the website can identify me. I only keep a container tab for such a website around, so I can open it if I explicitly want to be logged in.
creator: kolAflash
